meanings.definition: The concluding section of a piece of music or video.
meanings.sent1: The band played a beautiful outro that left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: After the movie ended, the outro music played softly in the background.
meanings.sent3: The outro of the video suddenly turned into a funny dance party.
meanings.sent4: The outro of the song was like a gentle farewell from a dear friend.
meanings.sent5: The outro of the film was so emotional, it brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: The final part of a performance or event.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was the spectacular outro of the carnival.
meanings.sent2: As the lights dimmed, the audience knew the outro was approaching.
meanings.sent3: The outro of the play involved a surprise appearance by a famous actor.
meanings.sent4: The outro of the party was a grand fireworks show lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The outro of the concert was a high-energy performance that left everyone cheering.

meanings.sent1: They will outro the event with a special announcement.
meanings.sent2: I always outro my presentations with a thank you to the audience.
meanings.sent3: Let's outro this meeting with a round of applause for our hard work.
meanings.sent4: She decided to outro her speech with a memorable quote.
meanings.sent5: The chef will outro the cooking demonstration by serving the delicious dish to the audience.
